question: This famous Italian was the author of many novels, which were later turned into highly successful movies, such as The Sicilian and The Godfather trilogy.

incorrect_answers: The Lion, The Witch and the Wardrobe

question: In every country in the world, except one, moving the head up and down means yes and moving the head side-to-side means no. In what one nation is that not the case?

incorrect_answers: A middle-aged divorced woman living alone.
A teenage boy who smokes marijuana.

question: Although natural, this food contains more calories than beet-sugar. It is used in a lot of skin-care products, but in the ancient Egyptians considered it --to be a cure for impotence and sterility.
Over 10,000 squibs were used in the film The Wild Bunch. What is a squib?
incorrect_answers: An old film technique in which animation is mixed with real people.
A film technique in which a few  vehicles  look like a long line of  vehicles.
A  method of over dubbing the audio of a scene to make it appear as if many people are talking.
